docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, Sept. 4.--The outbreak of war in Europe finds twenty-one nations of the Western Hemisphere united for the first time in their history by diplomatic machinery which makes  it possible for them to act in unison to face any...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, Sept. 4.--The outbreak of war in Europe finds twenty-one nations of the Western Hemisphere united for the first time in their history by diplomatic machinery which makes it possible for them to act in unison to face any contingency likely to arise.
docs.abstract: Neutrality declared; Cardenas offers peace aid

headline.main: ALL AMERICAS ACT IN CONCERT ON WAR; Declaration of Lima Provides for First Time Machinery for Full Consultation NEUTRALITY IS KEY POLICY Argentina Gives Cue for Latin Republics--Cardenas Offers Peace Offices

byline.original: By JOHN W. WHITE Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Sept. 4. --The Hamburg-American freighter Olinda, loaded with cereals and canned meat, was sunk in the South Atlantic by the British cruiser Ajax, the British Legation announced today.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Sept. 4. --The Hamburg-American freighter Olinda, loaded with cereals and canned meat, was sunk in the South Atlantic by the British cruiser Ajax, the British Legation announced today.
docs.abstract: Brit cruiser Ajax sinks German freighter Olinda off Cape Polonio in South Atlantic after crew is warned and removed; Ajax illus; 4 German U-boats reptd cruising near Curacao
